experience.description: Performed “full-stack” data analysis including data exploration, feature construction, and visualization to assist law enforcement in their anti-human trafficking investigations.

Integrated analytical tools into social media data collection pipeline (Twitter, Facebook, Youtube). Built and implemented the analytical structure for ground-truth surveys regarding human trafficking, maternal health, military withdrawal, and other socio-political issues. Assisted in development of hidden population estimator to gage prevalence of human trafficking.
Re-designed survey tool to understand student motivation and increase undergraduate response rates. Facilitated data collection through interviews and “think-alouds.”
